title: What are the best ways to improve our science skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just start seeing science in your monotonous everyday. Here are some few examples:  1)Turmeric stains turn red on application of detergent.(couldn't get the pic) Science Behind: Turmeric is a acid base indicator which turns red when comes in contact with base.    2) When you walk, your hands starts moving too Science behind: Just to balance your body weight and to avoid tripping, brain send in signal for hand movement   3) Light objects can also lift up heavy objects Science behind: Positioning of fulcrum (layman language)In other words, since torque is equal to product of force and radius. Torque applied by man is greater than that applied by weight of stones.(Radius is distance between fulcrum and point of application of force) Hope, this would help :)

Science is the one of the interesting field,as a science student we need to improve our self a lot.We always need to update our knowledge.Science is a updating subject.Nowadays due to the advance of the technology there are lot of effective education systems available easily.We can’t study science only through our textbook.There are so much research process are taking place across the world.Now scientific results are coming due to the research.We must update our knowledge.More than listening the class room lecture students can easily capture the video pretensions and slide shows.There are so many websites available for this.
